forecast-period.text: A trough lies over the southern reaches of the Gulf of Carpentaria, across southern Cape York Peninsula to a tropical low in the northwest Coral Sea. The monsoon flow over the northern parts of the Gulf of Carpentaria has weakened significantly as the monsoon burst has now moved eastwards into the northwest Coral Sea.

Wind gusts can be 40 percent stronger than the averages given here, and maximum waves may be up to twice the height. Wind warnings are issued for today and tomorrow and describe the highest category of wind warning for that day.
For latest warnings go to www.bom.gov.au, subscribe to RSS feeds, call 1300-360-427* or listen for warnings on relevant TV and radio broadcasts.
* Calls to 1300 numbers cost around 27.5c incl. GST, higher from mobiles or public phones. Marine forecasts are also available on VHF and HF radio. View the radio schedule on www.bom.gov.au/marine
Check the latest Coastal Waters Forecasts for information on wind, wave and weather conditions for neighbouring coastal zones.

area.description: South East Gulf of Carpentaria: QLD-NT Border to Cape Keerweer

forecast-period.text: Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: Northwesterly below 1 metre. Weather: Mostly sunny. 20% chance of a shower north of Kowanyama, near zero chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm north of Kowanyama during the morning and afternoon.

Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 0.5 metres, increasing to below 1 metre south of Kowanyama. Weather: Mostly sunny. 20% chance of a shower. The chance of a thunderstorm from the late morning.
Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre. Weather: The chance of a thunderstorm in the morning. Mostly sunny afternoon.

area.description: North East Gulf of Carpentaria: Cape Keerweer to Crab Island

forecast-period.text: Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: Northwesterly below 1 metre, increasing to 1 to 1.5 metres offshore. Weather: Partly cloudy. 70% chance of showers north of Cullen Point, 50% chance elsewhere. The chance of a thunderstorm.
Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers. The chance of a thunderstorm.
Winds: Variable about 10 knots. Seas: Below 0.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 40% chance of showers. The chance of a thunderstorm.
